casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Michael Rene GARRETT, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157544
COA: 341352 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 20, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to file a supplement to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The supplement will be accepted for filing if submitted on or before May 4, 2018.
